title: Number of hospitals in Canada by province 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of establishments in the y axis.
The Number of establishments is appeared to be the highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
The minimum Month Yukon has got 492.0 times less Number of establishments than the maximum Month Ontario.

Month  has the second highest value for Number of establishments.
